# 内在小孩

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/neizai-xiaohai
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/neizai-xiaohai
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install neizai-xiaohai
neizai-xiaohai <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g neizai-xiaohai
neizai-xiaohai <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
